skills.name: multi-agent-assessment
skills.definition: 6-agent parallel analysis (Backend, Frontend, Infrastructure, Testing, Documentation, Synthesis). Each agent assesses their domain, Synthesis agent consolidates into unified report with grades A-F.

output_format.executive_summary: Overall grades by area, critical findings, quick wins
output_format.recommendations: Prioritized (P1 critical, P2 important, P3 nice-to-have)

skills.name: architecture-review-pattern
skills.definition: Systematic architecture review covering: Service boundaries, Data flow, Integration points, Scalability concerns, Security posture, Strengths, Concerns (prioritized), Improvements, Scalability roadmap, Key metrics, Testing gaps, ADRs needed.
sections: Data Flow (primary paths, event bus, consistency)
Integration Points (service â†” service, external APIs)
Scalability Concerns (SPOF, stateful vs stateless, DB patterns)

skills.name: anti-pattern-catalog
skills.definition: Documented anti-patterns found in audits: Hardcoded project_id defaults (security), N+1 queries (performance), No circuit breaker for external APIs (resilience), Single points of failure (availability).

anti_patterns.name: No circuit breaker
anti_patterns.fix: Add tenacity retry with exponential backoff

skills.name: production-readiness-checklist
skills.definition: Checklist derived from audits: Multi-tenant isolation, API authentication, DB connection pooling, AlertManager deployed, Backup strategy, Rate limiting, Secret management, Event schema versioning.
important_items: Add circuit breakers for external APIs

concepts.name: Health Score
concepts.definition: Letter grade (A-F) representing area health: A (90-100%) excellent/production-ready, B (80-89%) good/ready with minor improvements, C (70-79%) adequate/needs attention, D (60-69%) poor/significant work, F (<60%) failing/major overhaul.

concepts.name: Quick Win
concepts.definition: Low-effort high-impact improvement: 1-2 hours to implement, immediate value. Examples: Archive session docs, add Redis exporter, deploy AlertManager.

concepts.name: ADR (Architecture Decision Record)
concepts.definition: Document capturing architecture decision: Context, Decision, Consequences, Status. Examples: Multi-tenant strategy, Event-driven architecture, Dagger SDK choice, Prisma vs SQLAlchemy.

relationships.description: Health assessment uses parallel agent execution
